类的使用
Jest.Player

使用Player的程序包 
程序包 说明
Jest  
Vue  

  • Jest中Player的使用

    Jest中Player的子类 
    修饰符和类型 类 说明
    class  HumanPlayer
    HumanPlayer is a class which represents for human players.
    class  VirtualPlayer
    VirtualPlayer is a class which represents for human players.
    声明为Player的Jest中的字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    Player GameTable.playerdecided
    playerdicided is the player who is going to take the offer.
    类型参数类型为Player的Jest中的字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    java.util.LinkedList<Player> GameTable.playerlist
    playerlist is a linked list of players who play the game (human players and virtual players)
    返回Player的Jest中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Player GameTable.decideOrder()
    decideOrder() decides the which player will be the next to take offer.
    Player GameTable.decidewinner​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> playerlisttocal)
    To decide the winner.
    Player GameTable.matchchar​(java.lang.String charateristics)
    At the end of the game, compare everyone's Jests to discover whose Jest meets the condition in the orange band of each trophy.
    Player Easy.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
    The virtual player takes offer.
    Player Level.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
    The virtual player takes offer.
    Player Normal.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
    The virtual player takes offer.
    Player Tough.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
    The virtual player takes offer.
    Player VirtualPlayer.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers)
    Call the function StrategyTake(LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers,VirtualPlayer vp)
    返回变量类型为Player的类型的Jest中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.util.LinkedList<Player> GameTable.fullofferPlayers()
    fullofferPlayers() checks the player in the player list one by one if their offers have been taken of not.
    参数类型为Player的Jest中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void GameTable.addplayer​(Player player)
    addplayer(Player player) enables to add a new player to the playerlist.
    void HumanPlayer.takeOffer​(Player player, int upOrDown)
    The human player takes a face-up or face-down offer from another player.
    void GameTable.takeOffers​(Player playerdecided)
    takeOffers(Player playerdecided) allows the player to take a card from other peoples' offers.
    类型变量类型为Player的Jest中的方法参数 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void ScoreCalculator.calculatescores​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> playerlist)
    For all the players in the game(in the player list),calculate their scores according to their Jest.
    void Visitor.calculatescores​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> playerlist)
    To calculate the score of each player.
    Player GameTable.decidewinner​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> playerlisttocal)
    To decide the winner.
    Player Easy.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
    The virtual player takes offer.
    Player Level.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
    The virtual player takes offer.
    Player Normal.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
    The virtual player takes offer.
    Player Tough.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
    The virtual player takes offer.
    Player VirtualPlayer.StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers)
    Call the function StrategyTake(LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers,VirtualPlayer vp)

    参数类型为Player的Vue中的构造器 
    构造器 说明
    InterfaceJest​(Player player)
    Constructor of the class InterfaceJest.
